<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/slas"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all service level agreements (SLAs) configured for the current site. SLAs define response time and resolution time targets that help ensure consistent service quality for tickets.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v1.0/slas](/docs/api/slas/list-slas) to list all SLA definitions.
2. Use `$fields=metrics.*` to include metric configuration details.
3. Extract `SlaId` values for use with activation, deactivation, or deletion endpoints.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [POST /api/v1.0/slas/new](/docs/api/slas/create-sla) - Create a new SLA
- [POST /api/v1.0/slas/\{SlaId\}/activate](/docs/api/slas/activate-sla) - Activate an SLA
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/slas/\{id\}](/docs/api/slas/delete-sla-by-id) - Delete an SLA

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
